candidates.why: Closest orchestrator-style workflow: multi-phase, session-scoped .workflow outputs, single confirmation gate, Skill(task-attach) + TodoWrite collapse/auto-continue patterns.
Downstream assembler that produces prototypes + preview artifacts (compare.html/PREVIEW.md); informs artifacts and verification for Phase 10.
Phase-level command referenced by explore-auto; provides Setup/Validation patterns and output layout for style-extraction artifacts.
Phase-level command referenced by explore-auto; defines layout template outputs and device-type handling for Phase 9.
Conditional phase command referenced by explore-auto; defines animation artifacts (animation-tokens.json/animation-guide.md) used for assembly.

selected.why: Best structural match for an autonomous, multi-phase UI design workflow orchestrator.

ts_evidence_pool.why: CCW command discovery scans nested .claude/commands trees (supports ui-design subfolders).
Canonical session artifact base path used across workflow tooling; aligns with --session outputs.

ts_evidence_pool.anchor: Generate compare.html and index.html for UI prototypes
ts_evidence_pool.why: Preview generation implementation for compare.html/PREVIEW.md artifacts referenced by the UI design pipeline.

ts_evidence_pool.anchor: Optionally generates preview files (compare.html, index.html, PREVIEW.md)
ts_evidence_pool.why: Prototype instantiation notes document preview artifacts; useful to align generate/explore-auto outputs.
Slash command normalization pattern; useful to validate command naming and discovery assumptions.
